SEARCH

Package it.unipd.dei.webapp.servlet

package it.unipd.dei.webapp.servlet
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    AboutUsServlet
     
    AbstractDatabaseServlet
    Gets the DataSource for managing the connection pool to the database.
    BanUserServlet
    Set a user in the database as banned (or if already banned, unbans him).
    ChangePasswordServlet
    Let a logged or verified user to change their password.
    CreateRecipeServlet
    Create a recipe in the database.
    HomeServlet
    Display the HomePage and forwards the request of the user to RankedRecipes servlet and to SearchRecipesServlet
    LogContext
    Provides the log context for the application on a per-thread basis.
    LoginUserServlet
    Searches for the user in the db to grant login and creats the session.
    LogoutUserServlet
    Check whether a user was already logged and closes the session.
    RankedRecepiesServlet
    Return an the ranked list of the recipes based on their number of likes
    RecipeApprovalServlet
    Get the list of pending recipes and reject or approve them.
    RecipeDetailsServlet
    Get and display the data related to a recipe.
    RecipeRecoveryOrRemovalServlet
    Get the list of rejected recipes and recover or remove them.
    RegisterUserServlet
    Creates a new user into the database.
    RemoveAllRejectedRecipesServlet
    Get the list of rejected recipes and remove them all.
    RestDispatcherServlet
     
    SearchCreatedRecipesServlet
    Search the recipes created by the user.
    SearchLikedRecipesServlet
    Search the recipes liked by the user.
    SearchRandomRecipeServlet
    Get a random recipe from the database.
    SearchRecipesServlet
    Return an the list of the recipes searched based on the ingredient and tags given from the user by get paramers
    SearchUserByEmailServlet
    Search a user by his email.
    SuggestedRecipesServlet
    return the HTML list of recipes with the closest number of Ingredients from what asked from the user
    UpdateLoggedUserDataServlet
    Update the data of a logged user.
    UserControlServlet
    Build and access the user control panel.
    UserVerificationServlet
    Autenticate the user using a one-time code
    ViewLoggedUserDataServlet
    Build and access the user data access page.

Web Applications is part of the teaching activities of the Intelligent Interactive Information Access (IIIA) Hub.
